alarmMessage: Alert. Pump 3 pressure {{pressure}} bar, exceeds threshold. Emergency action required.
pressureAnalysisResponse: Pressure rose sharply from 13.0 to 15.5 bar over the last 1 hour. Flow sensor values are normal.
valveOperationResponse: Valve V-102 operation in progress. Currently set to 50%. Monitoring pressure changes.
pressureRecoveryMessage: Pressure has recovered to normal range. (Current: {{pressure}} bar)
reportGenerationResponse: Today at 10:45 AM Pump 3 pressure anomaly action report generated as PDF and sent to administrator.
statusQueryResponse: Pump 3 current status: Pressure {{pressure}} bar, Valve V-102 position {{position}}%
